name: polaris
description: Polaris is a self-hosted music streaming server with a sleek web UI. It serves Music library content over the browser or app and supports playlists, search, and metadata.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Stream your music library to web browsers and mobile devices

features.title: Library Organization
features.description: Automatically organize music by artist, album, and genre with metadata

features.title: Playlist Management
features.description: Create and manage playlists for different moods and occasions

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find songs, albums, and artists quickly with full-text search

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Create separate accounts for family members with individual libraries and playlists

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Access your music from iOS and Android devices with native applications
